text: Tex Lee Boggs (born May 13, 1938) is an American academic and retired politician who was a state senator in the Wyoming Senate from 1999 to 2006. He was president of Western Wyoming Community College and provost of Antioch University Los Angeles.http://www.antiochla.edu/directory/tex-boggs/ ==References== Category:Wyoming state senators Category:Living people Category:1938 births Category:Heads of universities and colleges in the United States
title: Tex Boggs
